text: Great Clips is an American hair salon chain. It has 4,100 locations across the United States and Canada. It is headquartered in Bloomington, Minnesota, a suburb of Minneapolis. It was founded in 1982. In 2013, it had system-wide sales of $1.03 billion. title: Great Clips
